entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
